title: Client issues during champed select (ranked)
body:
Today i have made 4 attempts to start a ranked game and all 4 times i get into a room and my client just stops responding.  I played a normal game earlier with no issues but 4 times in a row the Client stopped responding and have lost 40lp just due to the game saying I didn't pick my champ or ban in time when on my end, the timer is at zero and nothing is happening.  Someone please help me.

edit:I have already run a repair

replies.body: The client closing here can be caused for a few reasons, the most common being either connection or third party.  If you have any apps running like play.tv or overlays remove them all as they've been to crash during this period.  Otherwise, your network might have a poor connection causing you to lose sync and get kicked off.  Your best bet would be to use the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to tune up your connection.  Hope that helps!
